@skillet92: Ep. 1-3 are out, and I'll  download the sources and if they're good, would be encoded. Soon.

@punk67: No problem...

Its okk bro.!
but the episodes after 1 & 2 ...have pretty good quality!

@skillet92: Out there is a lot of confusion - in reality, in season one, only three episodes have been aired. Confusion is caused by so called episode one (which belongs in kind of "preview" or season 00), available through few forums/boards, what is a patchwork of fifty web-ripped mini-sodes (approx. FIFTY where some are few seconds long) and naming of actually aired episodes is shifted by that. Episode 1 become Ep. 6 part 1, ep. 2 got label ep. 7 part 2 and so on and on. Pretty stupid. And ... I do have wide-screen sources of all three - but quality is so bad that I would encode them only if you insist and ONLY if you read this and write me back.

i know all the confusion!
the episodes from e03-e07 are a pack of mini episodes which are available in one single 700mb file!
i request u to encode all the episodes from e08 if the quality is of your standards ....or else u can chuck it...i really have  no problem!
.... and in fact, you need ep. 3 not 8. That's what I meant, OK? I have it  It's named Hulk Versus the World. Is that correct?

Bro.!
I need this episode!
which will air on 27th Oct "Some Assembly Required"
